placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
context: Use in context of: Весенний Париж: Ваше идеальное путешествие ждет!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This image will showcase the beauty of Paris during spring, featuring parks and streets filled with flowers and people enjoying the season.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
